Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lodbrok.control.LoginController

  • public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Fabio Riberto LoginController class is in charge to process the login requests and validate the session keys

        Returns:

      • wipeExpiredSessions

        public void wipeExpiredSessions()
        This method delete a session while it is expired. This shall be called from SessionWiper to check if there are sessions that can be removed because of the expiration time is reached

      • isSessionActive

        public boolean isSessionActive(java.lang.String sessionKey)
        This method check if a session is valid or over
        Parameters:
        sessionKey -
        Returns:
        true if the session is valid

      • formatSessionKey

        public java.lang.String formatSessionKey(java.security.SecureRandom random)
        This method generates and formats a new session key. The requirement is to have an uppercase string representing session i.e.: UICSNDK
        Returns:
        the sessionKey as a String (Upper Case)

      • getSessionLife

        public int getSessionLife()
        This method returns the session max life time in milliseconds
        Returns:
        int the sessionLife
